channel.title: VOX | Andy Klee | Entertainer
channel.managingEditor: andyklee@solidgoldstudios.co.za (VOX | Andy Klee Solid Gold Studios)
channel.copyright: © Andy Klee, VOX and Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved

description.p: Andy Klee is a renowned and delightful singer, MC and entertainer for a vast range of corporate events. Let Andy dazzle you with her vast range of entertainment talents, samples of which are included here.

channel.itunes:subtitle: Experience the wonder of Andy Klee for yourself
channel.itunes:author: VOX | Andy Klee | VOX | Solid Gold Studios
